code: /** Classroom actions */import{ClassroomService}from"../services/classroom";import{ClassroomConstants}from"../constants/classroom";import AlertActions from"./alert";export var get_all_classwork=function get_all_classwork(){return function(dispatch){ClassroomService.get_all_classwork().then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:ClassroomConstants.GET_ALL_CLASSWORK,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var post_new_classroom_material=function post_new_classroom_material(classroom_id,data){return function(dispatch){ClassroomService.post_new_classroom_material(classroom_id,data).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:ClassroomConstants.ADD_CLASSROOM_MATERIAL,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var delete_classwork=function delete_classwork(classroom_id,classwork_id){return function(dispatch){ClassroomService.delete_classwork(classroom_id,classwork_id).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:ClassroomConstants.DELETE_CLASSWORK,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var post_teacher_to_classroom=function post_teacher_to_classroom(classroom_id,teacher_id){return function(dispatch){ClassroomService.post_teacher_to_classroom(classroom_id,teacher_id).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:ClassroomConstants.ADD_TEACHER,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var upload_marked_classwork=function upload_marked_classwork(classroom_id,classwork_id,data){return
